com.bbbond.simpleplayer.playback

接口 Playback

  • 所有已知实现类:
    LocalPlayback

    public interface Playback
    Created by hunyuan on 2017/3/20.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  Playback.Callback 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        void start()
        Start/setup the playback. Resources/listeners would be allocated by implementations.

      • stop

        void stop(boolean notifyListeners)
        Stop the playback. All resources can be de-allocated by implementations here.
        参数:
        notifyListeners - if true and a callback has been set by setCallback, callback.onPlaybackStatusChanged will be called after changing the state.

      • setState

        void setState(int state)
        Set the latest playback state as determined by the caller.
        参数:
        state - state

      • getState

        int getState()
        Get the current PlaybackState.getState()
        返回:
        state

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        返回:
        boolean that indicates that this is ready to be used.

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        返回:
        boolean indicating whether the player is playing or is supposed to be playing when we gain audio focus.

      • getCurrentStreamPosition

        int getCurrentStreamPosition()
        返回:
        pos if currently playing an item

      • getDuration

        int getDuration()
        返回:
        the total length of currently item

      • setCurrentStreamPosition

        void setCurrentStreamPosition(int pos)
        Set the current position. Typically used when switching players that are in paused state.
        参数:
        pos - position in the stream

      • updateLastKnownStreamPosition

        void updateLastKnownStreamPosition()
        Query the underlying stream and update the internal last known stream position.

      • play

        void play(android.support.v4.media.session.MediaSessionCompat.QueueItem item)
        参数:
        item - to play

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause the current playing item

      • seekTo

        void seekTo(int position)
        Seek to the given position
        参数:
        position - position

      • setCurrentMediaId

        void setCurrentMediaId(String mediaId)
        Set the current mediaId. This is only used when switching from one playback to another.
        参数:
        mediaId - to be set as the current.

      • getCurrentMediaId

        String getCurrentMediaId()
        返回:
        the current media Id being processed in any state or null.

      • setCallback

        void setCallback(Playback.Callback callback)
        参数:
        callback - to be called
